MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Moss Lane, Clifton Road, Elm Tree Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:42pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5pm on 10th March 2021.
